caption:
On September 9th at CrossFit Riverfront we will be holding our 2nd Annual Philadelphia Flyers Riverfront Throwdown! This competition is teams of 2, same sex, both RX and scaled categories. When signing up for this event you and your partner will automatically receive two Flyers tickets, two competition shirts, FREE treatment provided by Redline Recovery and a chance at CASH PRIZES! 
RX STANDARDS ARE AS FOLLOWED

Male 155 Clean and Jerk Female 105

Pull Ups

Male 20# Wall Ball Female 14#

Double Unders

Box Jumps

SCALED STANDARDS 
Male 115 Clean and Jerk Female 75

Male 50# Kettle Bell Swings Female 35#

Male #14 Wall Ball Female 10#

Single Under

There will be raffles all throughout the day provided by sponsors and the Philadelphia Flyers!

http://www.rxcompetitions.com/#!/event/2022/2nd-annual-philadelphia-flyers-riverfront-throwdown!
